A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a star wars fan since about 25 years and I never thought I could ever hate a star wars movie nor that it could be ever that bad\, that I have to. I loved Rogue One and was positive surprised by episode 7. Even for me as a big fan of the expanded universe it was a movie I can live with. But episode 8 I will try to forget. I just have to. It looks like Star wars and has great effects\, no question. But the story is lame\, the cheap jokes made my beloved characters just ridiculous. I dislike the way they present Luke Skywalker. I dislike how they present Leia. I dislike how they present the force as overpowered at the one side and as source of bad jokes at the other. I just dislike almost everything in this movie. It felt like more Spaceballs 2 and seriously I had to ask myself a few times\, if I'm awake or have a very bad dreaming. They just can't mean this crap for serious...
